title: Sugar Snap Peas with Ginger and Garlic
directions: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then sauté shallots, ginger, and garlic, stirring, 1 minute.
Add peas and sauté, stirring, 2 minutes. Add water and simmer, stirring occasionally, until peas are crisp-tender, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon finely chopped peeled fresh ginger
